analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8.sol:
	Contract ShieldCureToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8.sol#197-199)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/3/0x0074d43246adc737101eca26bc8681c481d10ae8.sol:
